description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Oct-26 03:51:57

TotalChargeCount.description: Units: count. Indicates the total number of charge cycles for this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalRechargeCount.description: Units: count. Indicates the total number of charge cycles that cross the 80% state of charge boundary for this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalChargeTime.description: Units: seconds. Indicates the total time spent charging this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

LastChargeTime.description: Units: DateTime in UTC. Date and Time of last charge for this Asset's/Truck's battery.

TotalChargeAH.description: Units: Ah. Indicates the total ampere-hours recorded during charging of this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalChargeWH.description: Units: Wh. Indicates the total watt-hours recorded during charging of this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalRegenAH.description: Units: Ah. Indicates the total regenerative ampere-hours recorded over this Asset's/Truck's lifetime.

TotalRegenWH.description: Units: Wh. Indicates the total regenerative kilowatt-hours recorded over this Asset's/Truck's lifetime.

TotalRegenTime.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total regenerative time recorded over this Asset's/Truck's lifetime.

TotalRegenCount.description: Units: count. Indicates the total number of regenerative events for this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalDischargeTime.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total time spent discharging this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalDischargeAH.description: Units: Ah. Indicates the total ampere-hours recorded during the discharging of this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalDischargeWH.description: Units: Wh. Indicates the total watt-hours recorded during the discharging of this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalBatteryTime.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total usage time of this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

PeakCurrent.description: Units: 0.0625 A/Bit. Indicates the absolute peak current delivered to or sourced from this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime.

TotalOverTempCount.description: Units: Count. Indicates the total number of over temperature events recorded over the Asset/Truck battery's lifetime.

TotalOverTempDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total time the Asset's/Truck's battery has spent over temperature throughout it's lifetime.

TotalLowSOCCount.description: Units: Count. Indicates the total number of low state of charge events recorded over the Asset/Truck battery's lifetime.

TotalLowSOCDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total time the Asset's/Truck's battery has spent in a low state of charge over it's lifetime.

TotalLowTempCount.description: Units: Count. Indicates the total number of low temperature events recorded over the Asset/Truck battery's lifetime.

TotalLowTempDuration.description: Units: Seconds. Indicates the total time the Asset's/Truck's battery has spent under temperature throughout it's lifetime.

BMS_ChargeAh.description: Units: Ah. Total ampere-hours recorded during charging of this Asset's/Truck's battery over its lifetime. Field read directly from CAN Bus rather than accumulated from raw battery data.
